item.title: Fuel consumption by model and manufacturer
item.description: European car fuel consumption data We found data from the Swiss automobile association TCS. While they provide a simple online tool Verbrauchskatelog, the data as a whole is downloadable only in PDF format here. One can read tables from PDF documents in R using the tabulizer package. A great example for itâ€™s use was published last year on R Views Player Data for the 2018 FIFA World Cup. In my case, I struggled to even install tabulizer on Ubuntu, so I had revert to Windows.
